credit_line: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
title: Design for a Punch Ladle
medium: Pen and black ink, graphite on cream tracing paper
description: Ladle drawn in plan and elevation. Round bowl with a long rectangular handle which curves backwards to form a loop bound with three attached bands. Underdrawing in graphite of ladle in golden section.
name: Drawing
